https://ehsanirani.github.io/.body:
Hi, I'm Ehsan.
    This is my personal page—a place for random notes on coding, science, and related curiosities.

For more info, see the about page.

https://ehsanirani.github.io/about/.body:
Hi! I'm Ehsan. By day, I'm a computational physicist and programmer. I'm into using scientific models, simulations, and agent-based approaches to understand stuff we see every day. For coding, Python gets the job done at work, but for my personal projects I like coding in Julia and Rust.
Some of my research from my university years can be found on my Publications page.
Experiences and Education


Senior Data Scientist 
Working on scientific industrial softwares for mining industry.


Postdoctoral Researcher,  Max-Delbrück Center for Molecular Medicine in Berlin,
Research on 3D Genome Organization


PhD in Statistical Physics, University of Göttingen, 
Research on rheology of weakly attractive soft particles


M.Sc. in Physics, Sharif University of Technology, Tehran, Iran


B.Sc. in Physics, University of Tehran, Tehran, Iran
https://ehsanirani.github.io/about/.title: About

https://ehsanirani.github.io/projects/ba.body:
This project began as a hobby side-project to model bacteria as active rod-shaped agents and study their migration in porous environments. Some of this work has been published in Phys. Rev. Lett. 128, 144501.
Collective Motion of Bacteria
One of the long-term goals was to investigate collective motion of bacteria in these settings. As a first step, here’s a simulation I built using the jax-md package—partly to test its cool features:

    
    Your browser does not support the video tag.
https://ehsanirani.github.io/projects/ba.title: Modelling Bacteria Migration in Porous Media

https://ehsanirani.github.io/projects/pr.description: Example description with a lot of words but without any meaning. Why use lorem ipsum when you can just write a lot of text that has no underlying meaning?
